name: Joy Cubes: Match 3 Puzzle
description:
Joy Cubes: Match 3 Puzzle - a fun arcade puzzle game in the genre of Match 3, which will please gamers with its stylish, modern, and high-quality graphics, a large number of levels with increasing complexity, simple controls, and funny characters.

Solve challenging levels and help funny cubes get to the Moon! Join up to the exciting journey with Joykis nation in the fantasy world. Go through deserts, caves, jungles, oceans and find all of the components to build a spaceship! It's time for Joykis to become a space nation! But be careful, because alien monsters also want to take the Moon under control and get an advantage in the match 3 war. Protect Joykis, and don’t let the evil and dangerous aliens realize their insidious plans.

Play on colorful locations! Collect spaceship parts! Fight with alien monsters! Solve interesting puzzles in the match 3 genre with different aims!

It's too hard and fun to make games oneself. I will be really appreciated your support: https://www.patreon.com/GiftBoxGames
